South Africa’s Film and Publication Board has warned parents to be “vigilant and closely monitor their children’s online activities” after claims that a dangerous cellphone app has reached the country. In a press release, the board raised concerns about the “Momo Challenge”.

FPB urges parents to be vigilant and closely monitor children’s online activities.  It has come to our attention that the game, Momo Challenge is a form of cyberbullying targeting young children.
